title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\KerberosConfig
name: KerberosConfig
description:
Specifies Kerberos related configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.KerberosConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_kerberos
params.description: Optional. Flag to indicate whether to Kerberize the cluster (default: false). Set this field to true to enable Kerberos on a cluster.

params.name: data.root_principal_password_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the root principal password.

params.name: data.kms_key_uri
params.description: Optional. The uri of the KMS key used to encrypt various sensitive files.

params.name: data.keystore_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of the keystore file used for SSL encryption. If not provided, Dataproc will provide a self-signed certificate.

params.name: data.truststore_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of the truststore file used for SSL encryption. If not provided, Dataproc will provide a self-signed certificate.

params.name: data.keystore_password_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided keystore. For the self-signed certificate, this password is generated by Dataproc.

params.name: data.key_password_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided key. For the self-signed certificate, this password is generated by Dataproc.

params.name: data.truststore_password_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided truststore. For the self-signed certificate, this password is generated by Dataproc.

params.name: data.cross_realm_trust_realm
params.description: Optional. The remote realm the Dataproc on-cluster KDC will trust, should the user enable cross realm trust.

params.name: data.cross_realm_trust_kdc
params.description: Optional. The KDC (IP or hostname) for the remote trusted realm in a cross realm trust relationship.

params.name: data.cross_realm_trust_admin_server
params.description: Optional. The admin server (IP or hostname) for the remote trusted realm in a cross realm trust relationship.

params.name: data.cross_realm_trust_shared_password_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the shared password between the on-cluster Kerberos realm and the remote trusted realm, in a cross realm trust relationship.

params.name: data.kdc_db_key_uri
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the master key of the KDC database.

params.name: data.tgt_lifetime_hours
params.description: Optional. The lifetime of the ticket granting ticket, in hours. If not specified, or user specifies 0, then default value 10 will be used.

params.name: data.realm
params.description: Optional. The name of the on-cluster Kerberos realm. If not specified, the uppercased domain of hostnames will be the realm.

methods.description:
